item.title: Predicting property prices
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Business quesiton 3 Dataset description 4 Steps 5 Result 6 Interpretation 1 Summary To see the code used in this post, visit my kernel on kaggle in R Markdown format. 2 Business quesiton 3 Dataset description The dataset House Prices: Advanced Regression Techniques was downloaded from Kaggle and put together by Dean De Cock. It has 79 explanatory variables describing 1,460 homes in Ames, Iowa.
